prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Chromatic Percussion, Guitar, Drums, Piano, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Piano, Guitar, Drums, and Chromatic Percussion, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This song is comprised of Chromatic Percussion, Guitar, Drums, and Piano, omitting Bass.

Style 3:
This composition is made up of Piano, Guitar, Drums, and Chromatic Percussion, Bass excluded.
